property.name: text
property.value:
A demo for JavaScript MQTT publisher / subscriber.
NOTE: The default assumes you have a broker server (e.g. mosquitto) running on 'localhost'. If you don't have a broker server, then try 'iot.eclipse.org' as the broker server address. It is an open and public broker server provided by the Paho project (https://eclipse.org/paho/).
The publisher publishes a message every second. The subscriber unsubscribes after the 7th message arrives.

property.name: text
property.value:
NOTE: To run this demo, an open-source local authorization entity (Auth) should be running. The Auth can be obtained in the github repository, https://github.com/iotauth/iotauth.
NOTE2: The parameter PROJECT_PATH in this demo should be set to the repository directory of iotauth.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

entity.name: Ramp2
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor
